_sText:
//////////////////////////////////////////
///				       ///
///		Eddie Maps	       ///
///				       ///
//////////////////////////////////////////

mg_seabattle
Map made by Eddie
Zip includes .bsp
To install extract the files in you server's maps folder.
-----------------------------------------------------------
Fun map with boats.
Each team has 8 boats, each boat must be controled by 2 players. One player drives the boat, the other controls the canon.
16 CT vs 16 T
Kill enemies destroying their boats, or using knifes.
To destroy a boat you need to hit it 3 times, when boat is destroyed all on it will die.

-----------------------------------------------------------

--Updates--

--V1--
-First Version

--V2--
-Increased maxplayers to 32
-Increased boats to 16
-New canon structure, easier to enter.
-Increased boat resistance.
-Added explosions on boats.
-Removed timelimit.
-Removed hurt on sea.
-Added 3D Skybox

V3 Done and Uploaded to FPSBanana
watch here http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/115057
